segments.text: May I speak to the apartment building manager , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm the manager . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping that the apartment on Main Street was still available .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why , yes , it is . Would you like to get a look inside the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it would be nice to see the apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can be there at 6 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . I'll see you at 6 . Do you want directions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm okay , thank you . I already checked out the address on MapQuest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you like the place , you can fill out an application form . I'll bring one with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything that I need to bring with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I won't need to see anything except your driver's license .
segments.speaker: S2
